```{r}
library(exscidata)
data("strengthvolume")

styrke1 %>%
mutate(time = factor(time, levels = c("pre", "week5", "post")))%>%
        ggplot(aes(time, combined.load, fill = group)) + 
        geom_boxplot() 

prepost_styrke <- styrke1 %>%
   filter(time != "week5") %>%
    mutate(time = factor(time, levels = c("pre", "post"))) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = time, 
              values_from = combined.load) %>%
  mutate(change = post - pre) %>%
  filter(!is.na(change))

m.linear <- lm(post ~ pre + group,  data = prepost_styrke)

m.2 <- lm(change ~ pre + group,  data = prepost_styrke)

m.log <- lm(log(post) ~ pre + group,  data = prepost_styrke)
  
summary(m.linear)
summary(m.2)
summary(m.log)
```
